Trade/Device Name(s): WaveSense JAZZ™ Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AgaMatrix JAZZ™ Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for AgaMatrix WaveSense JAZZ™ Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Indicated for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, palm, or forearm for self-testing by persons with diabetes or for use in clinical settings by healthcare professionals to aid in monitoring diabetes control
